HomePage.aboutJbuidDesc1: Jbuid is a free online gaming platform. Our expert team's goal is to provide the best selection of games on the web and deliver an excellent experience for players.
HomePage.aboutJbuidDesc2: Jbuid is accessible directly from your browser and serving players from various countries and languages. Our goal is to provide a fun, functional, and cost-free experience for all users.
HomePage.catalogDesc: Our game catalog is carefully curated by our team of experts. With thousands of games for all tastes and ages, around 2 million players choose Jbuid every month to play and have fun.

About.title: About Us
About.welcome: Welcome to {domain}! Here, youâ€™ll find a wide range of fun and casual H5 games you can enjoy anytime.
About.description: {domain} is a simple and entertaining HTML5 game platform made for students, office workers, and anyone looking to kill time. No login, no ads, completely free.
About.joinUs: Love what we do? Join us! Weâ€™re always open to new ideas and collaborations here at {domain}.
About.aboutUsContent: {domain} was created by a small indie team with a passion for fun and accessibility. Whether youâ€™re on your commute, taking a break, or just chilling at home, we make it easy to jump into a quick game anytime, anywhere.

About.privacyContent: At {domain}, your privacy matters. We collect only limited and necessary data to provide a smooth gaming experience. Learn more on our dedicated Privacy Policy page.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: At {domain}, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.
Privacy.infoCollection: 1. Information Collection: We may collect personal information such as your name and email address when you voluntarily provide it. We also collect non-personal data like your IP address, browsing behavior, and inputs to help improve our services.
Privacy.infoUse: 2. Use of Information: The information we collect is used to provide and improve our services, respond to inquiries, and send updates or promotional content.
Privacy.infoSharing: 3. Sharing of Information: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties unless required by law.
Privacy.cookies: 4. Cookies: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. You can disable cookies via your browser settings, but this may limit some functionality.
Privacy.security: 5. Security: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal data. However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
Privacy.additionalInfo: At {domain}, we value your privacy highly. We collect browser information including your IP address, referrer, and visited pages. The only other personal data we collect is what you submit in our online forms. {domain} is the sole owner of this information, which is used only for statistical traffic analysis.
Privacy.cookiesAndTech: {domain} uses cookies and other technologies to improve your online experience and understand how our services are used to enhance quality.
Privacy.thirdPartyAds: We use third-party advertising companies to serve ads when you visit our site. These companies may collect non-personal data about your visits to this and other sites to display ads related to your interests.
Privacy.googleAds: Google Ads: As a third-party vendor, Google uses cookies to serve ads on our site. The DART cookie allows Google to serve ads based on your visits to our site and others on the Internet. You can opt out of DART cookie use by visiting Googleâ€™s ad and content network privacy policy.
Privacy.policyUpdates: This policy may be updated without prior notice, so please check it periodically for changes.
